short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LWC Generator is a tool to generate Lightning Web Component (LWC) template.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LWC Generator is a tool to generate Lightning Web Component (LWC) template for Salesforce Lightning Platform. Configure your lwc component settings with inputs and clicks, then press "Download" button to get lwc out of the box component files.
